org.jgrapes.core

Class NamedChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.NamedChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Channel, Eligible

    public final class NamedChannel
extends Object
implements Channel

    This class provides channels that are identified by a name (string). Instances of this class represent channels that use their name as value for matching channels with handlers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.jgrapes.core.Channel
